long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flappy Bird Official - Chrome Extension ğŸ¦ğŸ®

The Flappy Bird Official Chrome Extension brings the fun and addictive gameplay of the classic mobile game right to your browser! ğŸ‰ With just a click, you can launch Flappy Bird anytime and play instantlyâ€”no need for downloads or extra apps. Your goal is simple: tap the spacebar to guide the bird through pipes without hitting them. Sounds easy? Think again! ğŸ˜…

Why install it?

Quick access: Play Flappy Bird directly in your browser with no loading time.
Instant entertainment: Perfect for short breaks or when you need a fun distraction.
Classic nostalgia: Experience the charm of the original game wherever you go.
Lightweight and fast: No lag, just pure gaming joy!
If you're a fan of challenging, retro-style games, this extension is a must-have! ğŸ®ğŸ’»

Play more games on the top-left menu, rate, share, full-screen on the bottom-right.
